question: Which Ministry has notified regulations for upgrading emission & safety features in Indian automobiles?
option3: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Road Transport has notified regulations for upgrading emission & safety features in Indian automobiles.
The Ministry has also issued draft notifications for anti-lock braking systems (ABS), airbags, reverse parking assist and crash standards for Indian vehicles. The Ministry has stated that there are plans to bring Indian automotive industry at par with developed nations in such regulations.
